attributes.action: Prime Minister Boris Johnson to step down from his position.
attributes.additional_details:
We request that this is done because the current faith in politicians is at an all time low, if Parliament want to earn the trust and respect of the British people then they need to listen.

Politicians are meant to represent the people, the people have had enough and no longer trust those who were elected and therefore without the support of the people there can be no Parliament.

For the sake of democracy, MP’s need to act.
attributes.background: We the people request that Parliament respect the will of the people and encourage the Prime Minister to listen to what the people are asking for. The British public have had enough of the scandalous activities that keep coming to light by the very people that make the laws.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
